verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump and French President Emmanuel Macron] [V: planted] [ARG1: a tree sapling] [ARG2: together] [ARGM-PRP: to celebrate the latter ’s trip to the United States] .
President Donald Trump and French President Emmanuel Macron planted [ARG1: a tree] [V: sapling] together to celebrate the latter ’s trip to the United States .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump and French President Emmanuel Macron] planted a tree sapling together to [V: celebrate] [ARG1: the latter ’s trip to the United States] .
